embed.title: Selene
embed.description: A burst hero who provides massive attack increase and damage immunity to friendly units in the battle opening.

fields.name: Active Skill: Moonlight Shackles
fields.value:
• Selene will stun the enemy in the targeted arena and bind them in place for several seconds.
• Stun duration: 9 seconds
• Range: 5

fields.name: Passive Skill: Moonlight Projection
fields.value:
• For a period of time after the start of the battle, Selene will give allied units partial damage immunity and increase attack power.
Damage immunity applies to all forms of damages, including reflection and curse.
• Duration: 3/3/3/4/4/4/5/5/5/6/6/6/7/7/7 seconds

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Moonlight Dance
fields.value:
• After several basic attacks, awakened Selene will trigger the <Moonlight Dance> skill to damage enemy units in front of her and reduce their attack.
• Trigger Number: 5/4/3/3/3
• Range: 4×8

fields.name: Arena Troops
fields.value:
• Magic Apprentice, Undead Soldier, Ballista
• Priest Mage, Peltasts, Taurus Witchers, Nun
• Frost Archers, Rhino Knight, Stone Golem
